jobs.title: Lead Web Developer
jobs.description: As the lead Web Developer and Designer at Tackle, I work on the Marketing Team to manage, maintain and improve the marketing site. My responsibilities vary at Tackle from DevOps, to Design Systems, to bug fixes, and more. I work mostly with Figma, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Next JS, WordPress, and PHP.

Marketplace Readiness Review.title: Marketplace Readiness Review
Marketplace Readiness Review.description: A React application built with Next JS and hosted on Vercel. The application is a tool for Tackle to analyze potential customers and their level of readiness in taking their software to market.
Marketplace Readiness Review.techStack: React, Next JS, Vercel, Marketo, Tailwind CSS

State of Cloud Marketplace Interactive R.title: State of Cloud Marketplace Interactive Report
State of Cloud Marketplace Interactive R.description: Created a landing page for the 2023 Tackle State of Cloud Marketplaces using Next JS, Tailwind, and Vercel.

jobs.title: Founding Product Designer
jobs.description: Created the founding product design and brand for Ampry. Ampry is an tech start up in Utah focused on Conversion Rate Optimization for hundreds of varying clients. Worked with the Adobe Suite, Figma, Webflow, and Shopify.

Ampry Website Redesign.title: Ampry Website
Ampry Website Redesign.description: Created a landing page for Ampry using Next JS, Tailwind, and Vercel.

Ampry Product Design and Design System.title: Ampry Blog
Ampry Product Design and Design System.description: Created a blog for Ampry using Next JS, Tailwind, and Vercel.
